TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BitmapMetadata extends System.Windows.Media.ImageMetadata implements class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public Class BitmapMetadata Inherits ImageMetadata Implements IEnumerable(Of String)
type BitmapMetadata = class inherit ImageMetadata interface IEnumerable interface seq<string>

summary.span: 提供对从位图图像中读取元数据以及将元数据写入位图图像的支持。

span.span: Provides support for reading and writing metadata to and from a bitmap image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与图像关联的元数据是描述图像，但不需要显示图像的数据。Metadata that is associated with an image is data that describes the image but is not necessary to display the image. 每个受支持的位图图像格式处理元数据以不同的方式，但用于读取和写入元数据的工具是相同的。Each supported bitmap image format handles metadata differently, but the facility for reading and writing metadata is the same. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 支持以下图像元数据架构： [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_exif](~/includes/tlasharptla-exif-md.md)]，文本 ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)]文本数据)， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ifd](~/includes/tlasharptla-ifd-md.md)]， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iptc](~/includes/tlasharptla-iptc-md.md)]，和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-xmp-md.md)]。supports the following image metadata schemas: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_exif](~/includes/tlasharptla-exif-md.md)], tEXt ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] Textual Data), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ifd](~/includes/tlasharptla-ifd-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iptc](~/includes/tlasharptla-iptc-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-xmp-md.md)]. 如果由公开获取使用，它是默认情况下以只读的可变操作将引发异常。If a is exposed by a that is obtained by using a , it is read-only by default and mutable operations will throw an exception. 如果通过公开包装另一个，它是可变的构造。If it is exposed by a that wraps another , it is mutable on construction. 和方法可用于构造和读取元数据查询。The and methods can be used to construct and read metadata queries. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何编写元数据[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)]使用 IFD 的映像和[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_exif](~/includes/tla2sharptla-exif-md.md)]架构。The following example demonstrates how to write metadata to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] image by using the IFD and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_exif](~/includes/tla2sharptla-exif-md.md)] schemas. [!code-csharp[BitmapFrameExample#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitmapFrameExample/CSharp/BitmapFrame.cs#7)] [!code-vb[BitmapFrameExample#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitmapFrameExample/VB/BitmapFrame.vb#7)]

span.span: Adobe Extensible Metadata Platform (XMP)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结对象 (或任何对象)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 为方便起见，此方法隐藏继承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法方法应不直接从代码中，除非调用在调用时重写此方法的基实现。This method is called by the method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method. 若要创建当前对象的可修改副本，请调用而不是直接调用此方法。To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call instead of calling this method directly. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

summary.span: 提供对元数据查询读取器的访问，该读取器可从位图图像文件中提取元数据。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与图像关联的元数据是图像的描述图像，但这并不显示的所需的数据。Metadata that is associated with an image is data that describes the image but that is not necessary for display of the image. 每个受支持的位图图像格式处理元数据以不同的方式，但用于读取和写入元数据的工具是相同的。Each supported bitmap image format handles metadata differently, but the facility for reading and writing metadata is the same. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 支持以下图像元数据架构： [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_exif](~/includes/tlasharptla-exif-md.md)]，文本 ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)]文本数据)， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ifd](~/includes/tlasharptla-ifd-md.md)]， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iptc](~/includes/tlasharptla-iptc-md.md)]，和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-xmp-md.md)]。supports the following image metadata schemas: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_exif](~/includes/tlasharptla-exif-md.md)], tEXt ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] Textual Data), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ifd](~/includes/tlasharptla-ifd-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iptc](~/includes/tlasharptla-iptc-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-xmp-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来写入到的元数据[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)]文件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to write metadata to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] file. [!code-cpp[bitmapmetadata#SetQuery](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitMapMetadata/CPP/BitmapMetadata.cpp#setquery)] [!code-csharp[bitmapmetadata#SetQuery](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitMapMetadata/CSharp/BitmapMetadata.cs#setquery)] [!code-vb[bitmapmetadata#SetQuery](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitMapMetadata/VB/BitmapMetadata.vb#setquery)] 写入元数据后，方法可用来读取该数据并发出作为文本字符串。After the metadata is written, the method is used to read that data and emit it as a text string. [!code-cpp[bitmapmetadata#GetQuery](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitMapMetadata/CPP/BitmapMetadata.cpp#getquery)] [!code-csharp[bitmapmetadata#GetQuery](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitMapMetadata/CSharp/BitmapMetadata.cs#getquery)] [!code-vb[bitmapmetadata#GetQuery](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitMapMetadata/VB/BitmapMetadata.vb#getquery)]

span.span: Removes a metadata query from an instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与图像关联的元数据是图像的描述图像，但这并不显示的所需的数据。Metadata that is associated with an image is data that describes the image but that is not necessary for display of the image. 每个受支持的位图图像格式处理元数据以不同的方式，但用于读取和写入元数据的工具是相同的。Each supported bitmap image format handles metadata differently, but the facility for reading and writing metadata is the same. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 支持以下图像元数据架构： [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_exif](~/includes/tlasharptla-exif-md.md)]，文本 ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)]文本数据)， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ifd](~/includes/tlasharptla-ifd-md.md)]， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iptc](~/includes/tlasharptla-iptc-md.md)]，和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-xmp-md.md)]。supports the following image metadata schemas: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_exif](~/includes/tlasharptla-exif-md.md)], tEXt ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] Textual Data), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ifd](~/includes/tlasharptla-ifd-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iptc](~/includes/tlasharptla-iptc-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-xmp-md.md)].

span.span: is .

exception.span: 当图像元数据为只读时发生。

span.span: Occurs when image metadata is read-only.

span.span: Provides access to a metadata query writer that can write metadata to a bitmap image file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与图像关联的元数据是图像的描述图像，但这并不显示的所需的数据。Metadata that is associated with an image is data that describes the image but that is not necessary for display of the image. 每个受支持的位图图像格式处理元数据以不同的方式，但用于读取和写入元数据的工具是相同的。Each supported bitmap image format handles metadata differently, but the facility for reading and writing metadata is the same. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 支持以下图像元数据架构： [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_exif](~/includes/tlasharptla-exif-md.md)]，文本 ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)]文本数据)， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ifd](~/includes/tlasharptla-ifd-md.md)]， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iptc](~/includes/tlasharptla-iptc-md.md)]，和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-xmp-md.md)]。supports the following image metadata schemas: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_exif](~/includes/tlasharptla-exif-md.md)], tEXt ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] Textual Data), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ifd](~/includes/tlasharptla-ifd-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iptc](~/includes/tlasharptla-iptc-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-xmp-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来写入到的元数据[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)]文件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to write metadata to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] file.
